description: Details pursuant to Conditions 10 (materials), 11 (block A1 flank wall treatment), 21 (landscaping), 27 (balcony screening), 37 (noise control) and 40 (Ashmount Road elevations) and partial approval of details pursuant to condition 12(b) (PV roof level structures) of application number P2015/2913/FUL dated 19/02/2016 (as amended by permission ref P2016/3568/NMA) (The demolition of the existing buildings on the southern part of the Former Ashmount School site and the erection of 46 residential units in three blocks with associated landscaping).
decision_conditions: You are advised that - as details of the roof-top plant, ancillary enclosures/structure; and lift overruns have not been submitted - only a partial discharge of condition 12 is hereby approved.  A further Approval of Details application will need to be submitted in relation to parts a), c) and d) in order to fully discharge condition 12.
